divs: Sighting Detailsn in the beggining than movved to 45 degree angle evenualy spaced apart. tha moved into horizontal poisition and the spaced horizontal L shape than despurts into random pattern of separt sightings in all directions still three objects with orange lights, apparantly watching the fireworks, we were in boats and mutiple people witnessed sightings and have caught video on cell phones
Summary: orange lights hubbering over lake mattoon watching the fireworks in verticale formatio
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Mattoon
